channel.title: Sports,Cricket on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Sports,Cricket on TechnoStreet

item.title: Assam cricketer Jintimoni Kalita selected in Indian squad for Women's Tournament
item.description: Assam cricketer Jintimoni Kalita selected in Indian squad for Women’s Tournament The championship will be held at Vizag from November 19.

item.title: Indian batter Suryakumar has been very clear in his processes, tactics: Dravid
item.description: Indian batter Suryakumar has been very clear in his processes, tactics: Dravid Suryakumar Yadav had played astonishing knocks in various seasons of IPL and T20Is for India since his debut in March 2021.

item.title: Men's T20 World Cup: India top-order fire in unison to rout Netherlands
item.description: Men’s T20 World Cup: India top-order fire in unison to rout Netherlands With Kohli struggling to find boundaries, Rohit cut loose by pulling Logan van Beek for a six over wide long-on, luck again fell in his favour

item.title: Men's T20 World Cup: South African cricketer Rilee Rossouw century sets up South Africa's big win against Bangladesh
item.description: Men’s T20 World Cup: South African cricketer Rilee Rossouw century sets up South Africa’s big win against Bangladesh Rossouw scored the first century by a South African in Men’s T20 World Cup and all-rounder Anrich Nortje claimed 4/10 as the Proteas thrashed Bangladesh by 104 runs

item.title: ICC rankings: India national cricket team former captain Virat Kohli storms into top-10
item.description: ICC rankings: India national cricket team former captain Virat Kohli storms into top-10 Kohli to guide his side to a memorable final-ball victory over Pakistan in Melbourne on Sunday, climbed up five spots to ninth position in the latest rankings.

item.title: West Indies Head coach Phil Simmons to step down from his post
item.description: West Indies Head coach Phil Simmons to step down from his post Cricket West Indies (CWI) confirmed Simmons will be stepping down from his role as head coach of the national men’s side following the team’s exit from the global event

item.title: T20 World Cup: Bangladeshi cricketer Taskin Ahmed's four-fer gives Bangladesh win over Netherlands
item.description: T20 World Cup: Bangladeshi cricketer Taskin Ahmed’s four-fer gives Bangladesh win over Netherlands Ahmed picked an incredible 4/25 to give Bangladesh a narrow nine-run win over Netherlands in their first Group 2 match in the Super 12 phase of the Men’s T20 World Cup
